user_name: Professional interested in AI & Machine Learning and Marketing

must_attend.event_name: Forty-Second International Conference on Machine Learning (ICML 2025)
must_attend.tagline: Premier international machine learning event with academics and industry leaders
must_attend.why_relevant: Top-tier AI & ML conference with global reach, attracting industry leaders and researchers. Excellent for networking with investors in AI space.
must_attend.expected_attendees: Thousands globally including top academics and industry professionals

must_attend.tagline: HubSpot’s marketing and sales conference with networking and workshops
must_attend.why_relevant: Leading marketing event offering high ROI through networking with senior marketing professionals and access to latest digital marketing strategies including AI integration.
must_attend.expected_attendees: Thousands of marketing leaders and professionals

should_attend.event_name: Third International Conference on Artificial Intelligence and Machine Learning (AIM-2026)
should_attend.tagline: Global platform for AI & ML experts to present research and explore business applications
should_attend.why_relevant: Strong AI & ML focused conference with professional networking and investor access in US tech hub.
should_attend.expected_attendees: Mid to large-sized global professional audience

should_attend.tagline: Focus on inclusive marketing and multicultural market engagement
should_attend.why_relevant: Key marketing conference with focus on inclusion and diversity, plus strong investor networking opportunities.
should_attend.expected_attendees: Hundreds of senior marketing professionals and investors

should_attend.event_name: Digital & Social Marketing Conference - North America (New York)
should_attend.tagline: Insights on digital marketing trends and AI marketing automation
should_attend.why_relevant: Strategic content on marketing and AI, strong networking with global leaders, suitable for investor connections.
should_attend.expected_attendees: Hundreds to over a thousand marketing experts

nice_to_attend.tagline: Conference on AI and science intersection with thought leaders
nice_to_attend.why_relevant: Focused on AI research but smaller scale, valuable for scientific networking but less so for business investors.

nice_to_attend.tagline: Multi-city forums discussing advances and applications in machine learning
nice_to_attend.why_relevant: Relevant for ML updates and industry networking but variable size and impact depending on city.

nice_to_attend.tagline: Series of digital marketing conferences on latest trends and AI integration
nice_to_attend.why_relevant: Strong marketing focus with AI components, good networking but less premium.

nice_to_attend.tagline: Digital marketing strategies with investor networking opportunities
nice_to_attend.location: Touhill Performing Arts Center, University of Missouri-St. Louis
nice_to_attend.why_relevant: Regional scale marketing event with decent networking; limited investor reach compared to national events.
